info.name: Spotify Compact 2018
info.description: Very compact Spotify Web Play for small browser windows or widgets. The menu is hidden away and appears on mouse hover. Only enabled in browser windows smaller than 980px wide.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.7
- Update for new sidebar design.
- Adds marquee to now playing song name, which allows long music names to be visible.

v0.6
- Improved playback buttons and currently playing layout

v0.5
- Compact and cleanup artist page
- Stop spotify hiding albums when window is small

v0.4
- Compact track list entry (affects search results, user song list, etc)
- Hide "top artist" from search results
- Fix website scope (was applying the style to all websites)

v0.3
- Compact search input and search results

v0.2
- Smaller top links
- Smaller headlines
- Custom background gradient

v0.1
First version includes:
- Stow-away sidebar
- Compact "currently playing" bar
- Hides spotify logo, bottom right corner buttons
- Compact some top links and buttons
- Enable support for small screens by removing a bunch of min-widths.
